posts.post_title: N43 Ewing PSA 4, N29 Morrill SGC 88, N172s
posts.post_content:
I have the following for sale. Right now can view under pastime08 on eBay.  I will try to provide scans here later.  Please check the images on the listing for now.  PP gift, check or MO only for these.  I will deliver at these prices. I am posting close or at my buy price but will consider reasonable offers on these:

N43 Ewing PSA 4 nice colorful card and clean $5500 OBO
N29 Morrell (Morrill) SGC 88 NM-MT example paid $3,600 years ago.  OBO
N172 Minnehan SGC 60 tough OJ $1000 OBO
N172 Seery  SGC 60 $460 OBO
N172 Giess SGC 60 $460 OBO
N172 O'Brien bat SGC 40 $330 OBO

Thanks in advance for looking.

Jason
